characters: GET OUT OR I'LL CUT HER FUCKING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON the churning compactor of a garbage truck. The CAMERA PULLS BACK and we SEE the truck, battered and olive-grey. A bored garbage man with a kerchief over his mouth hangs on the back of the truck as it moves along the street.

dialogues.speaker: THE BED
dialogues.text: As LAWSON awakes with a start. He's late 30's, a little worn. He shakes his WIFE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unnn...sounds like...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .the garbage men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Tuesday?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe they changed the schedule... Lawson listens to the noise as it APPROACHES, finally throws his feet into his bedroom slippers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs into the pantry, dragging several ungainly plastic trash bags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck SOUND is CLOSER now. We can SEE it at the end of the long driveway. Lawson flings the green plastic bags into two battered and half-full metal cans, starts running down the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute, wait a minute!

dialogues.speaker: END OF DRIVEWAY
dialogues.text: The truck stops at the bottom of the driveway. Lawson stumbles his way towards it, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was afraid you'd miss me --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COOKE -- The man behind the truck -- pulls an Ingram submachine gun INTO VIEW. At the same moment, the cab of the garbage truck is kicked open and DIAZ, the driver, leans out, similarly armed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry-we won't. And they cut Lawson down, the bullets raking across his body and the cans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lawson falls back, spread-eagled. The garbage cans, pierced and leaking, roll TOWARD THE CAMERA, blocking our view just as Cooke moves close to administer a coup de grace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FORRESTAL grins INTO THE CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ain't seen nothin' yet. Cont.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 Cont. CAMERA ADJUSTS TO SHOW us that Forrestal is just now closing the trunk of a big new Cadillac. He's showing it to Diaz, who nods and makes noncommital NOISES as Forrestal continues the hype. FORRESTAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as trunk closes) Hear that sound? American workmanship. You think the Japanese invented that? Bullshit We did...sure, we lost it for a while-but we got 'it back. Diaz gets into the car. FORRESTAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, get in...comfy, right? I know what you're gonna say... it's cloth. But take it from me-you don't want leather, it's hot, it cracks, it's trouble. And look at the head room.. .you're not gonna have a problem... Diaz starts the engine. FORRESTAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead, start it up. Hear that? That's power-that's performance .that's -- Jesus Christ -- Forrestal has said this last because Diaz has thrown the car into reverse, knocking down a big display. FORRESTAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! ANOTHER ANGLE 9

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diaz slams the car into forward, hits the accelerator and ROARS across the display room floor. The car SLAMS into Forrestal, flinging his body across the hood. The car continues on, CRASHES through the outside window and disappears down the street. CUT TO: A85     4 10

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dangling working lights illuminate the night. The tuna fleet is in. 11

dialogues.speaker: DOCK
dialogues.text: mid-thirties, well muscled, BENNETT helps another worker wrestle a net of fish into a hold, then he wipes his brow and shouts over the. noise. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's all for me, Les. Les nods. Bennett steps off the boat, crosses over another boat and steps onto his boat. 12 BENNETT'S BOAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett starts his boat, revs the throttle, then pulls away from the other boats. The wind whips his hair as he cruises out into the night. 13 FULL SHOT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boat moves away from us, then WHOOM, the boat EXPLODES into a fireball, sending debris high into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man comes out of the shadows on the dock and watches the explosion, the fiery lights splashing onto his face. It's Cooke - the "garbage man."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MAIN TITLES BEGIN...and along with them we HEAR MUSIC. The CAMERA SKIMS OVER snow-capped peaks, pine trees twinkling dew in the morning light. Then we SEE it: An 80's version of a log cabin...with crisp, clean lines...energy efficient and snug. A85     5 ANOTHER ANGLE 16

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as a giant FIGURE descends from the mountains behind the house balancing a giant log on his right shoulder and carrying a chain saw in his left hand. This is COLONEL JOHN ALEXANDER MATRIX. He's in his mid-thirties ...a man of raw power and vitality...and something else: Joy. Joy, and a sense of calm. Matrix reaches a shed behind the cabin. He puts down the log and chain saw, then picks up firewood and begins to SPLIT it with awesome single swipes of an axe. INTERCUT:

dialogues.speaker: HOUSE 17
dialogues.text: as a shadow comes stealthily alongside the house and begins to slowly and cautiously advance on Matrix. INTERCUT:

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND APPROACHING PERSON 18
dialogues.text: Matrix doesn't turn or otherwise seem to see the other person...but he reacts to little things:

dialogues.speaker: A. A TWIG
dialogues.text: cracks.

dialogues.speaker: B. A SQUIRREL
dialogues.text: scampers away, startled.

dialogues.speaker: C. SOME PEBBLES
dialogues.text: roll away.

dialogues.speaker: D. A GATE
dialogues.text: responds with a faint creak while:

dialogues.speaker: E. THE AXEHEAD
dialogues.text: reflects a dull, indistinct figure approaching Matrix from behind. None of the above escapes matrix's eye...and then, at the last possible second, he WHIRLS and confronts: A85     6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEW ANGLE 24 s Matrix sweeps up the intruder-his eleven-year-old daughter, JENNY. She laughs as he tickles her. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad... Dad... put me down. She tickles him back on his neck and ribs...he laughs, puts her down. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I surrender, I surrender. He raises his hands, open, trusting. Instantly she attacks again, then runs like hell as he pursues her, MUSIC CONTINUES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix's Blazer is parked here. Father and daughter sit across from each other-she has a cone, he has a dish. He uses his spoon to steal some of her flavor and jimmies...he gets away with this twice before she pokes him on the nose with the cone. He wipes ice cream from his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix and Jenny are trout fishing in a beautiful stream. A deer tentatively approaches and matrix and Jenny take food from a knapsack and hold it out for the deer. The deer comes closer, takes the food from them, then licks their hands. DISSOLVE TO: MATRIX 26-A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: shows Jenny karate moves. She tries a move on him and he pretends she's knocked him over. DISSOLVE TO: MATRIX 26-B

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: gives Jenny a piggyback ride over the bridge that crosses the stream, as they head back to the cabin. CUT TO: A85     7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix goes to open the refrigerator in his cabin a stops. Taped to the door is a cutout of a heart: Jenny is peeking at Matrix from around the corner of the kitchen. He sees her, he smiles, and they meet and hug. MUSIC AND TITLES END.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix sits at the table as Jenny serves lunch. The view through the expansive picture window is breathtaking Matrix leafs through some of Jenny's rock'n'roll magazines. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I was a boy and rock and roll came to East Germany, the communists said it was subversive... (SLIGHT SMILE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .They were right... (BITES INTO SANDWICH JENNY BROUGHT HIM)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .What's in this? JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't want to know. Suddenly Matrix gets an odd look on his face ...he stands cocks his head. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong? He shushes her, puts his hand up to block the sun as he peers through the picture window. Now Jenny -- and the audience -- can SEE what matrix's keen senses have already heard-an approaching aircraft.

dialogues.speaker: HELICOPTER 29
dialogues.text: with U.S. Army markings, coming towards the house... then veering off for a landing. TWO SHOT 30 JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said you wouldn't go away again. You said you were through -- MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going anywhere. Cont. A85     8

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 Cont. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promise? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promise. THE COPTER 31

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It lands. Three men get out. GENERAL FRANKLIN KIRBY is in the lead. He's in his early 50's, fit, energetic -- and, as we can SEE -- the pilot of the craft. He's wearing rugged Army Class "C's." The two young soldiers with him are HARRIS and JACKSON. They wear BDU's and carry carbines. At a look from Kirby they fan out, and watch the cabin. KIRBY 32

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirby approaches the cabin. KIRBY (CALLING OUT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John, come on out. It's Kirby. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) I know. Startled, Kirby whirls to see Matrix standing behind him. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silent and smooth...just like always. He smiles and he and Matrix come together and shake hands MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I better be. You taught me. He affectionately squeezes Kirby's shoulder. Jenny comes out of the cabin toward the two men. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to talk to your dad, Jenny. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way, Jose. Matrix gives her a sharp look and Jenny grudgingly goes back inside. Kirby and Matrix begin to walk as clouds billow high above the mountaintops around them. Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 32 Cont. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone's killing your men. MATRIX (STARTLED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gave them new identities... KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There must have been a leak. Lawson, Forrestal... Bennett have all been hit. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's doing it? X KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've made enemies all over the X world, John. It could be the Syrians, the South Africans, the Russians-or a terrorist group. (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gonna find you. Matrix looks toward the cabin. Jenny is watching him through a window. Matrix turns back to Kirby and they begin walking back to the cabin. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were going to make a normal X life here... KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will...I promise. I'm going X into the city to coordinate with the Federal people. In the meantime, Jackson and Harris will stay with you. Matrix looks the two soldiers over. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They any good? KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Real good... (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But not as good as you were. OUT 33- 36 CUT TO: A65     10

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX
dialogues.text: watches the chopper lift off and fly away. Jenny, subdued, comes out of the cabin. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it bad? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving you... if that's what you mean. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it can't be bad. She smiles. An intense look comes over Matrix's face, then -- In a BLUR, he sweeps up Jenny in his arms just before machine gun fire BLASTS the cabin. The VOLLEY OF FIRING SHATTERS the windows and RIPS OPEN Harris' chest, his blood SPLATTERING against the cabin. .Matrix, still clutching Jenny, DIVES through the door into the cabin and HITS the floor. Jackson CATCHES a round in the shoulder, SPINS to the ground, then crawls through the door after Matrix. The three of them lie on the cabin floor as the FIRING CONTINUES to BLAST AWAY at Harris' body, the rounds SMACKING into the side of the cabin. Then the firing stops. Silence. MATRIX (WHISPERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How bad you hit? JACKSON (WHISPERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make it. MATRIX (WHISPERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to get my rifle from the shed. Keep an eye out, they'll be coming. You're downwind, the air currents might tip them off. Cont. A85     11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 Cont. JACKSON (WHISPERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Downwind?? (looks at Matrix like he's crazy) You think I'll smell them coming? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did. Matrix and Jenny move low to the floor toward her bedroom MATRIX (WHISPERING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay out of sight, I'll be right back. Jenny goes into her bedroom and Matrix goes out the backdoor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He races to the shed, unlocks it, goes inside to a high-tech cabinet and opens it. Inside is an H&K assault rifle, two big banana clips ammunition and a Baretta JS pistol. Matrix pulls the weapons out and readies them. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackson peers out the window, sees nothing, then edges back to the floor. Two hands WHIP a garotte around his neck and CHOKE the struggling Jackson to death. JENNY 40

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hears a THUMP and sticks her head out from under her bed to look, but sees nothing. Suddenly, footsteps approach her bedroom door. She pulls her head back under the bed just as two boots enter her bedroom. A knife is attached to one of the boots. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix puts the pistol in his waistband and SLAMS home a clip in the rifle. He RACES out of the shed, RUSHES to the cabin and OPENS the backdoor. Jackson, garotte still around his neck, falls lifelessly through the door STRAIGHT INTO THE CAMERA. Matrix ducks as Jackson GLANCES off him and CRUMPLES to the ground. A85     12

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix, H&K rifle held ready, silently enters, then moves carefully through the cabin. He peers into the den and sees Diaz, one of the men who killed Matrix's men, sitting in a chair, looking at Jenny's QГЏВїВЅ91

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix steps forward and points his rifle directly at Diaz. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she? Diaz smiles and puts his feet up on a table. DIAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mellow out, man. We can't talk business with you waving guns in people's faces. Matrix puts the rifle against Diaz's forehead and COCKS the trigger. The smile vanishes from Diaz's face. DIAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's safe, Major. Whether she stays that way.is up to you. My people got some business with you... Matrix hears a NOISE outside, glances out the window and sees two vehicles RACING away from the house. DIAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .and if you want your kid back, you gotta cooperate. Right? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong. Matrix levels the H&K and BLASTS Diaz in the chest. Diaz and the chair are JERKED violently backward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix JUMPS out of the cabin and RACES to the BLAZER, its hood up. He checks the engine. Torn wires stick up, the distributor cap is disconnected and broken. Cont. A85     13

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 43 Cont. He looks down the mountain and sees the vehicles winding along the mountain roads. Matrix slams the Blazer's hood...gets inside...puts his weapons on the seat...then releases the brake. Then, one hand on the wheel, the other on the door frame, he begins to push the car. He steers it not towards the dirt road, but towards the shoulder where a steep incline leads downward. Since the Blazer is pointed the wrong way, Matrix is pushing it uphill-the effort is incredible... the veins on his neck stand out...with a SCREAM, he puts everything he's got into it... and finally it begins to roll downwards. Matrix leaps in. Snaps on the driver's shoulder belt... reaches over and wraps the passenger belt around his body as well. The Blazer rolls over the edge.

dialogues.speaker: BLAZER
dialogues.text: as it bounces wildly down the 45 degree slope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix fights to control the wheel. A low-hanging branch SMASHES the windshield. DARK VEHICLE 46

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It takes another curve. CAMERA PANS UP, and we SEE the Blazer, coming closer and closer by this direct route. THE BLAZER 47

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It barrels down the mountainside, out of control, smashing through trees, bounding off rocks, dropping like a stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix is taking a terrible beating. But he's almost down to the road...ahead of the black vehicle!

dialogues.speaker: WINDING ROAD 49
dialogues.text: The two vehicles narrowly miss each other-the dark car almost spins out. THE BLAZER 50

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It careens past the other car, slams into a huge boulder -- flips -- ROLLS OVER AND OVER. A8 5     14

dialogues.speaker: THE OTHER VEHICLE 51
dialogues.text: o.s. of this mishap, rushing down the road.

dialogues.speaker: THE WRECKED BLAZER 52
dialogues.text: The wrecked Blazer is BURNING, then suddenly EXPLODES. The CAMERA HOLDS ON this, what looks like Matrix's funeral pyre. Then we SEE movement and SEE a bloodied and injured Matrix crawling away from the intense fire. He stops and looks back at the destroyed Blazer. WIDER ANGLE 53

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large group of armed soldiers start to surround Matrix. He stands up, cut, bleeding. The lead man approaches to frisk him. MATRIX 54

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix ELBOWS him in the stomach, DRIVES his fist into the man's Adam's apple, PULLS HIM DOWN, CRACKS the man's vertebrae, grabs the dead man's rifle and SLAMS the butt against the face on the man closing on him. The man's jaw SHATTERS. But three more men are immediately on Matrix and they wrestle him to the ground. He forces his way up again, th three men still all over him. Matrix's eyes suddenly WIDEN as he looks at two boots wit an attached knife, then up at the man standing in them. It's Bennett, the man we saw die! MATRIX (STUNNED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were -- Bennett reaches up with a bulky pistol and points it at Matrix. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead... He FIRES at point-blank range. Matrix is BLASTED backward to the ground. CUT TO: A85     15 55

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett and GENERAL ERNESTO ARIUS (in guerrila fatigues) walk through a large warehouse filled with tanks, jeeps and soldiers carrying bazookas, machine guns, mortars, etc. It looks like a small army. CUT TO: 56 SPECIAL EFFECT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An intense white light SHIMMERS at the CAMERA, almost as if the light were floating on water. It is so BRIGHT it hurts our eyes. CUT TO: 57

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix's motionless body is lying on a slab of a table. His eyes slowly open as he looks at the same BRIGHT LIGHT That light in on the ceiling of the small room he is lying in. Matrix groggily shakes his head, sits up a little and sees Bennett holding up the bulky gun. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tranquilizers. General Arius approaches Matrix. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember me, Major? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I remember the people you tortured and killed. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand a country like Val Verde, Major. It needs a president with an iron hand. It needs my hand again. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why tell me? ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you're going to return to Val Verde and kill the president you helped to overthrow me. Cont. A85     16

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 57 Cont. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you have Bennett do it -- he was there with me. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But President Velasquez trusts you; after all, he made you a (IRONIC SMILE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Hero of the Revolution...' (SMILE VANISHES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Captain Bennett, left, shall we say, under a cloud... MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (glances at Bennett) He enjoyed the killing a little too much. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You trained me, Major. ARIUS (TO MATRIX)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can get close to Velasquez, you will kill him...We've gone to alot of trouble to find you. We faked Bennett's death so Kirby would get nervous and lead us to you. And now that I have you, you'll do what I tell you. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if I don't? Arius looks at Matrix for a beat, then Arius nods to Bennett. Bennett opens a sliding door to a closet and matrix sees Jenny. She is gagged and tied tightly to a chair. She is shaking from fear and her eyes are wet with tears. Matrix LUNGES up from the table, but his hands and feet are chained to the table and he is STOPPED. Bennett wheels Jenny out of the closet over to Arius. Arius begins to finger her hair. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So pretty-There are many things I'm going to teach her. Cont. A85     17

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 57 Cont.l Matrix FIGHTS at the chains like a crazy man, but he can't move. Arius fingers the shirt collar around her neck. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You kill Velasquez, Major, and you'll get her back. You try anything else... (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .and I'll send her to you in pieces. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Kirby stands in front of the cabin looking at the bodies of Jackson, Harris and Diaz. Soldiers are searching around and inside the cabin. One of the Soldiers approaches Kirby. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any sign of Matrix? SOLDIER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No Sir, just those bodies... (PAUSES)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .You think there's more? KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he's still alive, I'd expect a lot more. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long, silver limo pulls up to an LAX terminal and parks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooke is at the wheel. Matrix (in a tropical suit) and Bennett are in the rear seat, SULLY and HENRIQUES on foldout seats facing them. BENNETT (TO MATRIX)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully will make sure you get on the plane and Henriques will stay with you to make sure you get off. If I don't get a call from either one of them, she's dead. Cont. A85     18

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 60 Cont. He motions and Henriques opens the car door and brings Matrix out with him. Sully follows them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix looks back at Bennett through the open door. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be back, Bennett... For you. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be ready. They eye each other, then Sully shuts the door and Matrix watches the limo drive off. Henriques and Sully flank Matrix and they enter the terminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three of them pass through the terminal. Matrix looks toward two police officers that are right next to them, but he remains silent. Henriques, Matrix and Sully walk through the X-ray booths as the security guard watches, then they continue on. CUT TO: BOARDING GATE 63

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They approach the boarding gate. Sully hands Henriques and Matrix their tickets, then Sully stuffs a $10.00 bill in Matrix's breast pocket. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have some beers in Val Verde, Matrix, it'll give everyone more time with your daughter. Matrix looks down at the bill, then up at Sully. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a nice guy, Sully, I like you... (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .That's why I'll kill you last. Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 63 Cont. Henriques takes Matrix's arm and moves him toward the gate. HENRIQUES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open your mouth again and I'll nail it shut. Matrix looks up at a wall clock. It reads 6:55. He X. and Henriques board the plane as Sully watches from the boarding area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Henriques and Matrix enter the plane. A STEWARDESS smiles at them and examines their tickets. STEWARDESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First class, seats seven A and B. They are the last passengers to be seated. They walk down the aisle, Matrix takes the window seat and Henriques the aisle seat. A NOISE attracts Matrix's attention and he watches the door to the entrance tunnel CLOSE. The Stewardesses prepare for the takeoff as the plane's engines begin to RUMBLE. Matrix edgily looks around the plane. The Stewardess approaches him. STEWARDESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must fasten your seat belt, Sir. Matrix looks out the window and sees Sully looking right back at him through the waiting room window. Matrix turns to the Stewardess. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could I have a blanket and pillow? STEWARDESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. She takes them down from the upper compartment and hands them to Matrix. Cont. A85     20

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 64 Cont. The plane is beginning to move. Matrix begins to arrange the blanket and pillow. As soon as the Stewardess moves off, Matrix DELIVERS an incredibly SUDDEN BLOW to Henriques' temple. WHAP! Henriques' eyes roll back in his head, blood trickles out of his mouth, his body goes limp and he falls against Matrix. It's happened so quickly none of the other passengers have noticed it. Matrix throws the blanket over Henriques' body, looks around, then quickly FORCES Henriques' neck down toward his chest. CRACK. Matrix stands and opens the overhead luggage rack. He picks up the blanket covered body and puts it in the overhead rack. The 2ND STEWARDESS comes by. 2ND STEWARDESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, can I help you with that? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's no problem. He smiles at her and she smiles back. He closes the luggage compartment door and turns to the Stewardess. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long is this flight? 2ND STEWARDESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We land in Val Verde in exactly eleven hours.. She moves down the aisle. Matrix looks down at his digital watch and presses a button.

dialogues.speaker: WATCH 65
dialogues.text: 11:00:00 appears on the watchface. Instantly, it starts counting down: 10:59:59, 10:59:58... MATRIX 66

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix starts down the aisle. Cont. A85     21

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 66 Cont. 2ND STEWARDESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, during takeoff you must -- MATRIX (COVERING MOUTH)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm airsick... He pushes by her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix moves to the service elevator, squeezes in, hits the controls and starts to descend.

dialogues.speaker: BELOW DECK 67-A
dialogues.text: the elevator stops in the service area of the big plane. Matrix gets out of the elevator and looks out a port. The place is moving faster! He turns and moves to a door marked CARGO HOLD. It's locked. He PULLS, the door starts to bend, then the lock suddenly SNAPS. He opens the door and crawls inside. CUT TO: PASSENGER AREA 68

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers sit unaware of anything unusual. LUGGAGE COMPARTMENT 69

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CLOSE-UP of the latch on the luggage compartment holding Henriques' body shows the latch imperceptively CLICK OPEN. CUT TO: 70

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane leaves the terminal area and turns toward the runway. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully watches plane approach the runway. CUT TO: A85     22

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INTERCUT the pilot talking with the control tower to clear the plane for takeoff. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane begins to roll down the runway. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix crawls through the crowded hold. Without looking, he starts to push a box out of the way and -- DOG CAGE 75

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A doberman Pinscher SNARLS and FLASHES HIS TEETH right INTO the CAMERA. Matrix jerks his hand away from the dog cage just as the Pinscher's teeth push between the bars. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane starts to taxi down the runway. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The luggage compartment holding Henriques' body edges open and a small corner of the blanket comes out. The passengers sit unaware. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix has reached the area immediately above the plane's landing gear. The NOISE is deafening. He digs his hands under the lip of the gear retract equipment and LIFTS with all his might. Nothing moves for a beat, he continues to STRAIN MIGHTILY and the cowling starts to move! With a final grunt, he lifts it up and pushes it out of the way. The ground rushes beneath the airplane. Matrix swings his feet into the hole. A85     23

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The plane takes off and ROARS into the sky, clearing the marshes at the end of the runway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix drops through the hole toward the moving ground!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He DROPS DOWN out of the plane twenty-five feet above the ground and SPLASHES into the shallow water with terrific impact. The plane zooms overhead. Matrix lies still, bobbing in the water. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully is on the phone. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It just took off. OUT 83 CUT TO: 83-A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix comes out of the water and looks at his watch. 84

dialogues.speaker: WATCH
dialogues.text: 10:52:52 left. 85 MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at the terminal in the distance and begins running toward it. CUT TO: 86

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A uniformed LATINO pilots a speeding war boat in the Pacific. Bennett, standing on the rear deck, watches Arius hang up the microphone on the two-way radio and then Arius disappears below deck. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 24 BELOW DECK 87

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jenny is huddled in a darkened cabin below. She wipes the tears from her eyes. The door opens, some light comes in and Arius enters the cabin. He moves toward Jenny and looks at her for a long beat. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father has just left for Val Verde; he should be back with you soon. Does that make you happy? JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... Arius sits down right next to her. He runs his fingers along her shoulder. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there anything else that would make you happy? JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watching my Dad kick your balls down your throat. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix jumps into the back of a fire truck that drives by the rear of the terminal. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully, walking through the terminal, stops as he sees a girl, CINDY, talking on a pay phone. She's a gorgeous stewardess in her late twenties. CINDY (INTO PHONE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, Lance, it's me! (PAUSE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy. Very funny ...yes, that Cindy. They just cancelled my 7:40 X to Vancouver... Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 89. Cont Sully takes off his dark glasses, eats her up with his eyes and adjusts his tie. Г‚ВЂВў CINDY (INTO PHONE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought since I'm laid over we could... no, laid over, Lance. Samantha? Who's that? Lance? Lance? She slams down the phone and does a slow burn. Then she turns, picks up her flight bag, starts to head off and finds her path suddenly blocked by Sully. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like you need a date. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck off, shithead... She pushes by him. Sully watches her go, smiles and then begins to follow her. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ГўВЂВў Matrix, wearing a ground crewman's jacket, is now the terminal. He looks desperately for Sully. Passengers mill ahead of Matrix, behind him and to the side, but there is no Sully. Matrix races through the crowded terminal, looks up. and suddenly stops. There Sully is! Sully is following Cindy along a downstairs walkway. Matrix slows down, then begins to track Sully as Sully follows the girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy enters the parking garage and approaches the passenger side of her ragtop Sunbeam Alpine convertible. She unlocks and opens the door, leaving the keys in the lock, then she LOWERS the top. The LOWERING of the top REVEALS Sully facing her on the other side of the car. SULLY (SMILING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what I could give you? Г‚ВЂВў

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cont.

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 91 Cont.. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, herpes. Sully's smile disappears. He looks at her, takes his sunglasses out of his coat pocket, nuts them back on, then turns and walks off. Cindy watches him to make sure he leaves. All of a SUDDEN, a giant arm encircles her waist from behind. MATRIX (WHISPERS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move. She looks down at the giant arm, unable to see Matrix sqatting behind her. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not moving. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going to hurt you. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what they all say. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ГўВЂВў Step to the side. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to move to do that. Matrix removes his arm from her waist. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it. Knees shaking, Cindy steps aside. Matrix leans into the car, grabs the passenger seat, YANKS it out and places it on the ground at Cindy's feet. Cindy, mouth gaping open, looks at the passenger seat now at her feet. I'LLTR IX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in. Cindy automatically starts to get in the car. Cont. 0

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: X 91 CONTRL MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You forgot your keys. Г‚ВЂВў

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts her car keys in her hand. She crawls across where the passenger seat had been and sits in the driver's seat. Matrix sits on the floor where the passenger seat had been and closes the passenger door. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just do what I tell you and I'll let you go. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to give Karate, junitsu, judo, and kung-fu lessons to my students at seven-thirty. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not gonna make it. She starts the car. Sully drives by them in his Porsche Targa. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow him. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew you were going to say that. She pops the clutch too fast, the tires SQUEAL and Matrix is SLAMMED back against the car floor. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully drives out of the airport garage and enters the flow of traffic. After a beat, the Sunbeam LURCHES out of the garage and begins to follow Sully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the Sunbeam, Matrix checks his watch. It reads 10:32:00. Cindy concentrates on following Sully's Porsche up ahead. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't get offended by this question, but... (PAUSES) Г‚ВЂВў

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you going to kill me or something? Cont.

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 93 Cont. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully drives his Porsche at medium speed along Century Blvd. He goes through as it starts to turn red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy eases her foot from the accelerator as she prepares to stop for the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix puts his foot on top of hers and PUSHES DOWN on the accelerator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Sunbeam RUNS through the red light. Г‚ВЂВў CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As dusk approaches, Sully drives along the freeway, occasionally glancing into his rearview mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy and Matrix continue in the Sunbeam, keeping a distance between themselves and Sully. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy is still at the wheel. Outside the car, dusk is approaching. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I ask you what this is all about? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody wants to kill my daughter Г‚ВЂВў

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and me. Cont.

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 96 Cont. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know your daughter, but ГўВЂВў I've known you for only ten minutes and I want to kill you, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As dusk approaches, Sully drives his Porsche into the Galleria. Cindy pulls her Sunbeam in two cars behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully parks his car, gets out carrying a briefcase, goes to the glass elevator, stares at TWO PRETTY VALLEY GIRLS, takes his dark glasses off and joins them in the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND CINDY 99
dialogues.text: Matrix and Cindy are sitting in her car watching Sully. As soon as the elevator disappears, Matrix grabs Cindy's keys from the ignition and takes her arm. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out. 1ГЇВїВЅ1 Cont. 0

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 99 Cont. She opens her door, Matrix slides next to her_.and they and they exit from her car. He moves her quickly toward the elevator. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're in a hurry, don't let me hold you up... The elevator returns and they get in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Galleria interiors runs around the perimeter of a three-story open vaulted area. In addition to the glass elevator, several tiered steps and banks of escalators run up and down the levels. Lots of decorative banners in hot colors decorate the open area. The top level is particularly active... restaurants, bars, video parlor, movie theatre. It's the hub of valley nightlife, lots of shoppers and kids just hanging out. Matrix and Cindy exit from the elevator onto the top level next to the wide-open vaulted space. Matrix immediately searches with his eyes for Sully. She takes a quick step to get away, but Matrix immediately GRABS her arm and PULLS her back toward him so they are now nose to nose. He motions to the other side of the top level and we SEE Sully walking. MATRIX X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispered, anxious) My daughter's been kidnapped and he's my only chance of finding her! If he sees me or I lose him, they'll kill her. I need you to follow him; if I get too close, he'll run. Cindy looks back at Matrix in shock. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pleading, desperate) Please help me, you're my only X chance! She's got less than ten hours left. Cindy doesn't know what to say. Matrix, still holding her arm, SHAKES her in desperation. Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 100 Cont. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispered, desperate)

dialogues.speaker: KILL HER
dialogues.text: Cindy looks at Matrix, glances toward Sully, then looks back at Matrix. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. X X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix lets her arm go and she rubs it gingerly. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it easy, all right. She continues to look at the pleading Matrix, then she turns and hesitantly begins walking toward Sully. Sully walks by a video game parlor, ogles some girls, checks his watch, then heads for the bar on this level. A85     30

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 100 Cont. Cindy walks around the open space, following Sully. She glances back tentatively at Matrix, then she keeps going. Matrix moves in the other direction around the open space, all the while watching Sully and Cindy. BAR 101

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New Wave music PLAYS as valley gals and sharp dudes dance and mingle about. Sully can dig this scene -- he puts his dark glasses back on. He sits at a table, puts the briefcase next to his leg and orders a drink. A LATIN MAN wearing a leisure suit, looking completely out of place in a joint like this, enters the bar, and stares at a girl with purple hair. He continues into the bar, catches Sully's eye and sits down at the table with him. He reaches under the table and slides the briefcase away from Sully until its next to himself, then hands Sully, still under the table, a bunch of passports. OPEN SPACE 102

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy approaches the bar, hesitates, then looks back at Matrix. Across the open space, he nods, urging her forward. She hesitantly moves forward. 103 BAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy enters the bar, then sees a young security guard, CATES, coming out of the men's room. She moves around a corner so Matrix can't see her and she stops the guard. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a huge guy across the way who either honestly needs my help or he's an escaped mental fruitcake. Take a look... Cates moves into the doorway, casually glances at Matrix watching the bar, then Cates moves out of Matrix's view. He removes the walkie-talkie from his belt and speaks into it. CATES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs, you there? 104 SECOND LEVEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another security guard, BIGGS, a muscular black kid, is flirting with some valley girls and ignoring the constant BEEPING of his walkie-talkie. Cont. A85     31

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 104 Cont. BIGGS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .This ain't no Mexican shit, I'm talkin' Maui wowie. Tired of the BEEPING, he picks up his walkie-talkie. BIGGS (IRRITATED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What it is, zitface... INTERCUT: 105 WITH CATES CATES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a guy up here who may be a wacko. I don't think I can handle him alone. BIGGS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool down, puke breath, I'll be right there. (smiling to girls) Wanna see me kick some ass? CUT TO: MATRIX 106

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix is getting anxious. He looks at his watch. 9:28:00. BAR 107

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully is in conversation with the Latin man, unaware of what's going on outside. Cindy sneaks a look outside and sees Biggs and his two valley girls approaching Matrix. OPEN SPACE 108

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs confidently walks along the top level, the girls following. He STOPS abruptly as he sees Matrix, his eyes bulge and he retreats into an alcove and pulls out his walkie-talkie. BIGGS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention all units! Emergency on the theater level! Suspect is six-foot-two, brown hair... (PAUSE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .and is one gigantic motherfucker?! BAR 109

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cates and Cindy are still out of Matrix's view. Cont.     32

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 109 Cont. CATES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd better stay here, Miss. He exits from the bar and moves toward Matrix. Cindy waits, biting her lip, wondering if she's done the wrong thing. Sully, still talking to the Latin, looks up and finally notices Cindy. He moves through the dancers toward her. 110 MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix anxiously glances at his watch, then looks up toward the bar. Cindy comes out into the doorway where he can see her. She glances behind him, then helplessly looks right at him. Matrix, noticing her glance behind him, turns around. Five security guards are now approaching him. 111 BAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully moves toward Cindy. at the doorway. Just as he is about to say something to her, he hears a commotion and glances outside. 112 MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix turns from the guards to point at Cindy in the bar and he suddenly sees Sully approaching her. 113 BAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully looks out toward the commotion and suddenly sees Matrix. And Matrix is pointing right at him! SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ... 114 TOP LEVEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully runs, bumping off of Cindy, and races out onto the top level. Matrix, seeing him run, turns back to the guards advancing on him and SMASHES the lead guard (Biggs) right in the face. Biggs is BLASTED backward into the other guards, KNOCKING two of them down. Matrix sees Sully running and then looks where's he's headed. A phone booth. CUT TO: A85     33 115

dialogues.speaker: ABRUPT DREAM IMAGE
dialogues.text: Jenny looks up as Bennett stands in front of her. He raises a gun and points it at her face. CUT TO: 116

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix SCREAMS. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: He jumps over the railing, LEAPS across an open chasm, DROPS eight feet toward a stairway, then RUSHES upward. Sully gets in the phone booth and quickly drops in a quarter. In the b.g., Matrix is RACING right toward the booth! Sully tries to dial as fast as he can. His face starts to CONTORT as he sees Matrix getting CLOSER and CLOSER. Sully's face is wet with sweat. Sully pulls out his gun and FIRES through the windowpane at the steadily looming Matrix. He misses. He won't get another chance. Matrix PICKS UP THE ENTIRE PHONE BOOTH, RIPS it from the wall and SMASHES it against the railing. People all over the Galleria begin to SCREAM. The Latin man dashes out of the bar with his gun drawn. Two real Los Angeles POLICE OFFICERS, racing up the escalator with their guns drawn, see the Latin. Cindy drops to the ground as the Officers aim at him. OFFICER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze!! The Latin SHOOTS away at the Officers, BLASTING one in the chest and KNOCKING him rolling and tumbling backwards down the escalator. The other Officer FIRES AWAY at the Latin, hitting him twice. The Latin SLAMS agains the railing, the briefcase bursting open. A85     34 SHOOTING UP 117

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thousands of bills come rushing out of the briefcase and begin drifting downward. LATIN 118

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Latin, blood oozing out his stomach and eyes drifting in his head, reaches over the railing to grasp futilely at the money. He reaches too far. SHOOTING UP 119

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Latin drops over the third floor railing, falling right through the drifting bills and CRASHES to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND SULLY 120
dialogues.text: Matrix tries to force open the broken phone booth door to get at Sully, but the bloodied Sully crawls out the other way through a broken window pane, hangs from the railing and drops to the stairwell below. People continue to SCREAM and hug the floor. Sully turns around and BLASTS a shot at Matrix above. It misses. He RACES down the stairwell, stepping on the huddled bodies. A security guard RUSHES him and Sully BLASTS him dead. Matrix, running along the third level, sees Sully jump off the stairwell and get into a glass elevator. It starts to descend. Matrix looks desperately around, looks at one of the giant decorative banners spanning the ceiling, jumps onto the railing and tears loose the banner's end. The LAPD cop kneels and aims his gun at Matrix and prepared to fire. Cindy is running right at the cop. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't! d! Matrix JUMPS, hanging onto the banner. Cindy KNOCKS the cop's aim away. The gun FIRES, missing Matrix. Cont. A8 5     35

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 120 Cont. I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix swings down to the lower level and CRASHES RIGHT THROUGH THE GLASS into the elevator with Sully. The cop comes up from the ground and looks at Cindy. She looks back at him uncertainly. He starts to bring the gun toward her and she moves quickly to a door marked "Stairwell" and disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix and Sully are both lying bloodied and dazed in the elevator. It descends silently, the two men lying in the broken glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator reaches the parking garage and the doors open. Sully crawls out and dazedly begins to trot toward his car. Seconds behind him, Matrix stumbles and chases him. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy races out of a door and comes out onto Sepulveda. A cop down the block points at her. She looks around desperately trying to figure out what to do. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully, in his Corvette, burns rubber, CRASHES through the wooden parking arm and heads out onto Sepulveda. Matrix, in Cindy's Sunbeam, is right on Sully's heels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully SHOOTS WILDLY out onto Sepulveda, BLASTING his horn as he swerves into the wrong lane. Cindy watches him zoom by. She looks down the block. Now the cop is RUNNING toward her. Matrix RIPS out onto Sepulveda. Cindy races out onto the street, her hands held up to stop him. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: WAIT
dialogues.text: Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 125 Cont. Matrix hits the brakes, almost hitting her as the car SKIDS out of control to the side. She runs toward it. Matrix puts the car back in gear, floors it and Cindy dives into the car as it starts to RACE by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix SPEEDS down Sepulveda chasing Sully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy, on her stomach, moves herself into a sitting position. She's now sitting on the floor where Matrix ripped out the seat. CINDY X (ANGRY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who in the hell are you?? Matrix doesn't answer. CINDY (ANGRY) X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You steal my car, rip the seat out, then kidnap me. You make me miss my hair appointment. You beg me to help you and your daughter, which I very kindly do. You get me into a shoot-out where people are getting killed and blood is spurting out all over the place...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully comes SPEEDING up Coldwater Canyon. The traffic is lighter now and Matrix pushes the Sunbeam's engine to the limit to catch him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CINDY X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I watch you rip a phone booth from the wall and swing from the ceiling like Tarzan...I stop the cops from killing you and then they start chasing me!! Matrix looks at the Corvette, changes gears and SPEEDS the Sunbeam faster. A85

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sully pulls onto Mulholland, then looks in the mirror. Matrix's headlights are getting closer. Sully FLOORS the Corvette, SLIDING around the curves along Mulholland. Matrix keeps pace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CINDY X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you tell me what the hell's going on? MATRIX X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... Sully's Corvette disappears around a curve, Matrix cuts the corner TIGHTLY and SUDDENLY a large truck

dialogues.speaker: COMES RIGHT AT THEM
dialogues.text: CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out!! A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 130 Cont. Matrix swerves the Sunbeam at the last moment, just grazes by the truck, and keeps going. Cindy has slid down in her seat and covered her face with her hands. She now opens her fingers, peeks through, then lowers her hands. She looks at Matrix. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd you ever get a driver's license? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He REVS the engine, bringing the car right up behind Sully, and RAMS it against the back of Sully's Corvette. BAM! They swerve around another curve. Matrix brings the car up close again. Sully half glances back and fires a wild shot.

dialogues.speaker: BLAM
dialogues.text: The windshield on the Sunbeam SPLINTERS. Matrix floors the car and completely SMASHES it into the back of Sully's car. WHAM! Sully's car SKIDS off the road, FLIPS a couple times, then CRASHES into the inside face of the cliff. Matrix and Cindy SKID off the road and CRASH into the X inside face of the cliff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix looks over at Cindy who's reeling from the effects of the crash. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I'm dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix sees Sully trying to get out of his car. A85

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gun in hand, Sully crawls dazedly out of the destroyed car. Matrix approaches, kicks the gun out of Sully's hand and picks the gun up. Matrix empties Sully's pockets and finds his wallet and a motel key. He picks Sully up, an ankle in each hand, so that he's holding Sully upside down. He begins walking with him. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she, Sully? SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you... Matrix is approaching the Sunbeam as Cindy is getting out. He swings Sully by the heels and BEATS Sully's head against the fender, leaving another dent in the already beat-up car. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my car, Matrix!! Matrix continues to carry Sully upside down. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't hear you, Sully. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: FUCK YOU
dialogues.text: MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loyalty is touching, Sully, but it's not important in your life right now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We SEE Matrix walk right up to the edge of a steep drop along Mulholland Drive. He has walked out of Cindy's sight. X Г‚ВЂВў MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But take gravity... He extends his arms and DANGLES Sully upside-down over the sharp drop. The Los Angeles Basin is spread out below, 180 degrees of twinkling lights. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gravity is very important in your life right now. Cont. A8 5

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 132 Cont. Sully tries to thrash about as the blood rushing to his face starts to redden it. Matrix lets go with his right arm. Sully's head drops a foot, Matrix's left arm drops a little, then adjusts to the new weight. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhhhh... MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to warn you, Sully... (TAPPING IT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is my weak arm. SULLY (DEFIANT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't kill me, Matrix. You X need me to find your daughter. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she? He SHAKES Sully, moving him like a fish on a line. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but Cooke knows. I could take you where I'm supposed to meet him. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you won't. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? Matrix uses his right hand to take something from his pocket and he dangles it in front of Sully. It's Sully's motel key. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I already know where. Fear starts to show in Sully's face for the first time as he STARES at the key. He tried to grab at the key, X but Matrix pulls it out of his reach. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember when I promised to kill you last, Sully? Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 132 Cont.l Hope flickers in Sully's eyes. SULLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Matrix... MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lied. He drops a SCREAMING Sully and Sully CRASHES to the rocks below.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND CINDY 132-A
dialogues.text: Cindy is looking at her sunbeam, which is smashed to shit, as Matrix approaches. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you don't have a car... Matrix looks at Sully's car, which is lying on its side. He PUSHES INCREDIBLY HARD against it and it SLAMS to the ground right side up. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I do...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They get into Sully's beat-up car and Matrix starts the engine and puts the car in gear to drive away. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute... Matrix looks at her. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'd you do with Sully? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...let him go. He FLOORS the accelerator, LEAVES RUBBER and BLASTS out of there. CUT TO: A85

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waves crash against a rocky shore. Arius' boat settles next to a dock and several Latinos (in guerrilla fatigues) secure the boat's lines. Arius, Bennett and Jenny exit from the boat and walk quickly down the dock. 134

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: a large estate. A guard patrols the perimeter wall of He sees figures approaching and turns on a bright searchlight, outlining Arius, Bennett and Jenny as they approach the estate. 135

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second guard admits them into an expensively furnished mansion, Bennett goes into a side room to join several soldiers. Arius and Jenny walk down a marble passageway, passing several lavishly decorated rooms. Arius stops her in front of a door and unlocks the door. 136 ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter a room that has been stripped of all furnishings, the windows boarded over. Arius LOCKS the door again, then looks up and down at Jenny. She takes a few hesitant steps backward. He gazes at her, then steps out into the hallway and CLOSES the door. Suddenly, the lights in the room go out, plunging Jenny into darkness. Jenny moves against a wall, slides to a sitting position on the floor and begins to shiver from the cold. CUT TO: 136-A X

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix is driving Sully's car, Cindy sitting next to him, through the streets of Los Angeles. They are moving RAPIDLY. A85

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry I got you involved in this. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why won't you tell me what it's about. Matrix reaches into his pocket, pulls out his wallet, opens it and hands it to Cindy. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about her. Cindy looks at a photo tucked into a wallet, clear plastic photo insert.

dialogues.speaker: PHOTO 136-C X
dialogues.text: It's a color photo of Jenny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is she the one that was kidnapped? Matrix nods. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some people are using her to force me to do a job. If I don't get to her soon, they'll kill her. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you do the job? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I knew they'd kill her even if I did it. The only chance she has is if I get to her before they know what I'm doing. Cindy looks at the photo. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is her mother -- Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 136-D Cont. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She died when Jenny was born. I was in Laos when it happened, so I came home intending to raise her. (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But on her third birthday I was in Lebanon. When she went to grade school, I was in Angola. When she had the measles, I was in Pakistan. And now she's been kidnapped because of me. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why were you always travelling? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was on special assignment. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean like in the Army or something? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or something. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things you don't want to know about. Things I sometimes wish I didn't know about. He looks over at Cindy, then looks away. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That part of my life is over with. All that matters to me now is Jenny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix drives the car into a parking lot in front of a motel and parks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix looks out the window toward the motel. Then Matrix looks down at his watch. A85

dialogues.speaker: WATCH 139 X
dialogues.text: 05:00 remains. It changes to 04:59:59 as we WATCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix gets out of the car, closes the door and starts to move across the parking lot. He stops as he notices Cindy getting out of the car, too. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helping you get her back. She closes the door and joins him. He looks at her for a beat, then they move toward the motel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They quietly and cautiously approach one of the motel rooms. The drapes are closed. Cindy stays a few feet back as Matrix, gun drawn, slowly EASES Sully's motel key into the door lock, then QUICKLY OPENS the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix, gun out in front, BURSTS into the room. No one's there. Cindy nervously peeks her head into the room, sees it's okay, joins Matrix inside, closes the door and locks the chain. They look around the room. Sully's suitcase is spilled open on one of the beds. Beer cans and fast food containers lay open and the bureau drawers are ajar. Matrix goes to the suitcase and searches through it. Cindy checks out the bureau drawers. Matrix finds nothing in the suitcase. He looks under the bed, then moves to the closet and looks inside. It's empty. There is a SUDDEN LOUD KNOCKING at the front door. Matrix and Cindy IMMEDIATELY LOOK AT EACH OTHER AND FREEZE. Cont. A85

dialogues.speaker: REVISED
dialogues.text: 141 Cont. Then Matrix quietly moves to her. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers, urgent) It's Cooke. Let him in... Matrix moves into the bathroom and turns on the shower. Cindy tears the covers off the bed, musses up her hair and unbuttons her blouse to show some cleavage. Matrix and Cindy edge up to the door and Matrix flattens himself aginst the wall close to the door. Cont. A85     42

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 141 Cont. He nods to Cindy and she opens the door a crack so the chain is still locking the door. Cooke, standing, outside, looks through the crack at her. COOKE (ALERT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Sully? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in the shower. Cooke listens a beat to the running shower. R COOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who're you? Cindy looks him up and down, then slouches toward the crack so her breasts push at her blouse. She smiles. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Room service... Cooke looks back through the door at her. Matrix, at the inside edge of the door,is holding_his gun, ready to fire. Matrix can only see Cindy. COOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open the door. Cindy unlocks the chain and opens the door. COOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move out of the way. Cindy moves away from the door. Matrix tenses, ready to attack. Cooke looks into the room at the rumpled bed, suitcase and fast food containers. The shower SOUNDS continue to echo from the bathroom. Cooke cautiously enters the doorway. WHAM! Matrix SLAMS the gun against the brawny Cooke's head. Cooke crashes back against the wall, but doesn't go down. He grabs Matrix's gun hand by the wrist and the two of them STRUGGLE for the gun. BLAM! BLAM! The gun FIRES into the ceiling as they wrestle around the room. They BREAK a table and CRASH into a chest of drawers. Cont. A85     43

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 141 Cont.I I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy moves to help Matrix. BLAM! The gun FIRES again, SHATTERING the lamp near Cindy, making her duck for cover. Cooke slowly FORCES the gun toward Matrix's face. The barrel gets CLOSER... CLOSER... then almost points right at Matrix. With a sudden SURGE of power, Matrix lifts Cooke off the ground, pushes him toward the wall and the two of them CRASH RIGHT THROUGH THE DOOR into the adjoining room. 142 ADJOINING ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A twenty-year-old couple in bed look up in shock as Matrix and Cooke bounce off their bed and SLAM against the wall. BLAM! The gun FIRES, SHATTERING the mirror above the young couple and they SCRAMBLE to safety on the floor on the other side of the bed. Matrix and Cooke come off the wall and SLAM onto the floor, the gun coming out of Matrix's hand. Cooke picks it up before Matrix can reach it. Cooke points the gun right at Matrix's face, pulls back the trigger, then smiles. COOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you, asshole. He pulls the trigger. CLICK. No more bullets in the bun. The blood drains from Cooke's face. Matrix looks at him. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you, asshole... He BLASTS Cooke in the jaw and Cooke goes backward through the broken door and falls to the floor. 143 ORIGINAL ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix races back through the broken door, starts toward Cooke, then stops cold. Cooke has fallen on the broken, sharp table leg and the leg goes into his back and comes out of his chest. Cont. A85     44

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 143 Cont. Matrix bends down to the barely alive Cooke. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she, Cooke? Cooke looks blankly back at him. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooke... Cooke!! Cooke's eyes go cold and still. He's dead. Cindy approaches and swallows as she looks down at his body, the stake coming out of his chest. Matrix starts emptying Cooke's pockets. There's a wallet containing only cash. Matrix tosses it to the floor. He brings out a lighter and a package of cigarettes, examines the lighter, then tosses both objects to the floor. He pulls out two keys on a key chain. They're car keys. Matrix leaps to his feet. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix and Cindy exit from the room and go out to the parking lot. Matrix looks at the six cars parked there, then he breaks a key off the chain and hands it to Cindy. MATRIX (URGENT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try the trunks. They split up. Matrix tries the car door key into a Pontiac. It won't open. Cindy goes to the trunk of a Honda. It won't open. Matrix races to a Ford. The door won't open. Cindy races to a Cadillac. She opens the trunk! Matrix races over to her and looks into the trunk. It's empty. He uses the door key and opens the Cadillac's door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix looks desperately around the inside of the Cadillac. Nothing. He opens the glove compartment and looks inside. Nothing. Cont. A85     45

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 145 Cont. He starts to come out of the car, then suddenly stops. He sees the edge of a piece of paper protruding from the pocket along the inside of the car door. He pulls the paper out and looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: PAPER 146
dialogues.text: It's an invoice from "Coastal Fuel, 110 Hermosa St., Long Beach, California, 90802" to "Patria Enterprises, 50 Redonda St., San Pedro, California, 90733."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix comes out of the car with the invoice and Cindy looks at it. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make any sense to you? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coastal is a fuel depot that supplies planes. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For who -- the airlines? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, usually smaller, private aircraft. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm getting my pilot's license. Coastal is where my instructor gets his fuel. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a lot of warehouses around Redondo Street. Arius must be keeping a plane there. Matrix closes the car door and pockets the invoice. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go. CUT TO: A85     46 148

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thirty guerilla soldiers are working in the same warehouse that Arius and Bennett had walked through earlier. Trucks, tanks, jeeps, bazookas, machine guns, mortars, etc. are spread around the darkened room. 149

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix removes a ground level, wire mesh grille from the warehouse's outside wall, then he crawls through and Cindy replaces the grille.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix crawls along the warehouse floor in the darkened room. He goes under a jeep, then pauses to survey the room. 151

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The soldiers move weapons, metal containers and wooden crates from the trucks to the jeeps. A soldier's feet walk right in front of Matrix, the soldier unloads a crate onto the jeep above Matrix, then the feet move away. 152 MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix crawls away from the jeeps, moves low through the shadows, goes into a corridor and sees a door ajar. 153

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A soldier, Vega, is looking at some charts on a table. 154 CORRIDOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix pushes open the door slightly to see into the rest of the room. As the door moves, it CREAKS on its hinge. 155 ROOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vega looks up from the charts and sees the door is open more then it was. He pauses, then starts walking toward the door. 156 CORRIDOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix starts to move away from the door, then stops. He hears FOOTSTEPS and CONVERSATION approaching the other end of the corridor. He's trapped! A85     47 ROOM 157

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vega is two feet away from the inside of the door. CORRIDOR 158

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix desperately grabs the door handle and pushes the door forward. ROOM 159

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix SLAMS his fist into Vega's stomach, then quickly MOVES into the room, puts a choke hold around Vega with his left arm, then carefully closes the door with his right. As soon as the door closes, the FOOTSTEPS and CONVERSATION pass right by the door outside in the corridor. Matrix pulls Vega toward the back of the room, SMASHES his Adam's apple, opens a closet,,drops the dead Vega inside, then closes the door. He moves to the door leading outside the warehouse, opens it and Cindy enters. They begin to whisper. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw all the equipment, but there's no plane. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about your daughter? Matrix shakes his head. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arius and Bennett aren't here. She's wherever they are. Matrix looks at Cindy in desperation for a beat, then they begin to look around the room. The room is designed as the aircraft control room. There are aerial charts on the tables and the walls. There are photos of several military planes and a civilian amphibious plane. There are copies of weather reports situated around the room and there is a VHF radio. A85     48 160 COORDINATES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix notes a set of military map coordinates penciled onto the side of a chart. They read, 8734-5245; 8142-5938; 7565-5474. A "Scale line" is drawn under the coordinates. 161 MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He studies the coordinates, then picks up a drafting compass and pen. He puts three dots, which corresponds to the three sets of coordinates onto a coasted chart of Southern California. 162 CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy is studying the photos of the aircraft. 163 CHART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix sets the width of the legs of the drafting compass, then puts the point of one of the compass legs onto one of the three dots and draws a circle. 164

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND CINDY
dialogues.text: FOOTSTEPS and CONVERSATION approach the door. Matrix stops drawing and freezes. Cindy looks toward the door. The FOOTSTEPS reach the door, then continue right by it. 165 MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix uses the compass to draw a second circle. 166 CHART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSEUP of the pen as it finishes a third circle, the three circles now intersecting right over a small island 200 miles west of Los Angeles. 167

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND CINDY
dialogues.text: Matrix looks at the island, then shows the chart to Cindy. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's going on out there. Cindy looks at the chart, then back at the photos of the aircraft on the wall. Cont. A85     49

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 167 Cont. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of these plane's an amphibian. Maybe they're using it to fly there. Matrix comes over and looks at the photo of the amphibian. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me see that invoice. Matrix takes it out of his pocket, shows it to her and she studies it.

dialogues.speaker: INVOICE 168
dialogues.text: She sees, "250 gallons of Type 4 aircraft fuel." TWO SHOT 169

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix and Cindy glance at each other as FOOTSTEPS go by outside. They continue to whisper. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Type four fuel is amphibian and two hundred fifty gallons is what it would take to fly that plane to the island and back. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's not here. I saw everything they've got. Cindy glances at the invoice, then looks up at Matrix. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was refueled at pump station thirty-two, Pacific Pier. That's San Pedro. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long's it take to fly out to the island? Cont. A85     50

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 169 Cont. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About two hours. Matrix looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: WATCH 170
dialogues.text: The watch reads 02:56:15 and counting down. CORRIDOR 171

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two soldiers, ROBERTO and Juan, come down the corridor They pass the room Matrix is in, then Roberto stops. ROBERTO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Momento... He comes back right toward Matrix's door. He turns the door handle. ROOM 172

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes into the room! Matrix and Cindy are flat against the wall, hiding behind the door, inches from Roberto. ROBERTO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vega? He looks around for a beat, then turns and leaves the room, closing the door. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix (carrying the chart) and Cindy move away from the warehouse and approach Sully's car. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we going to the plane? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet. She looks bewilderedly at him. CINDY
