dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shopping. CUT TO: A85     51

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix and Cindy are in Sully's car SPEEDING along a street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix is driving, his face HARD. Cindy glances over at him. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix and Cindy slowly drive by the front of a "Guns and Survival Equipment" store. It is heavily barricaded with a thick steel grille. They pass some street construction equipment (steamroller, caterpillar, forklift, flashing warning signs, etc.), and drive to the rear of the store. There's a heavy concrete wall with no windows. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you get in? Matrix JERKS the car into reverse and RACES the car backwards around another building until the car is o. s. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera is in the store shooting out through the steel grille. We hear a RUMBLING NOISE and then we SEE IT. Matrix is atop a steamroller that is ROLLING right AT THE CAMERA. The steamroller CRASHES into the front of the store and the GLASS SHATTERS INWARD and the steel grille BUCKLES AND CRACKS APART under the roller. Matrix jumps off the steamroller as the alarm starts to CLANG. He takes a shopping cart (like in Safeway) and starts working the aisles. Cont. A85     52

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 177 Cont. Along the first aisle, he grabs a snorkel, mask and flippers and tosses them into the cart, then grabs a deflated and compressed rubber raft and paddle and tosses them in, too. He takes the cart and SHOVES it down the aisle, the cart coming to a rolling crash among the debris at the front of the store. Cindy takes the cart and quickly rolls it out of the store. Matrix moves to the next aisle, takes another shopping cart and moves down the aisle. He grabs O.D. fatigue pants, an assault-extraction survival vest, a camouflage sweater, black survival boots, and combat knives. He gives the cart a shove and it rolls crazily down the aisle into the debris. Cindy quickly rolls the cart outside. Matrix moves to the counter and starts feverisl-rly moving his hands along the underside looking for something. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, come on... He suddenly feels the hidden button and presses it. Behind him, a wall containing innocuous sporting equipment slides to the side, revealing a hidden room. Matrix pushes a cart into the room. The store alarm continues to CLANG. HIDDEN ROOM 178

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This room is loaded with every kind of illegal weapon imaginable. It's an AWESOME sight. Matrix garbs an Israeli Desert Eagle (Monster 44 automatic handgun), a 9mm. submachine gun, a 12 gauge assault shotgun with folding stock, a Steyr 223 assault rifle, a LAW rocket launcher, grenades, dynamite and fuse, bandoliers with ammo and loads everything into the cart. A85     53 STORE 179

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wheels the cart out of the hidden room, moves down the aisle with it, then carefully pushes it so it rolls by itself the rest of the way to Cindy. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the car. Cindy catches the cart, glances inside and her EYES BULGE. She wheels the cart away. HIDDEN ROOM 180

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix reenters the hidden room, sees if he's missing anything, is satisfied and leaves the room. STORE 181

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix passes by the counter and SUDDENLY A COP comes out from behind the aisle with his shotgun pointed right at Matrix's head. He COCKS the trigger. COP

dialogues.speaker: FREEZE
dialogues.text: Matrix quickly looks toward the other direction to flee. A SECOND COP is at the end of the other aisle with his shotgun also pointed at Matrix's head. He COCKS the trigger. Trapped! CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The police paddy wagon drives through the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix is standing in the back of the paddy wagon, his face up against the small, wire mesh "window" that leads to the front seat where the two cops that arrested him, DARYL and FRED, are sitting. MATRIX (URGENT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you'll call Kirby, he'll tell you!! A8S     54 COPS 184

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daryl looks over at Fred and rolls his eyes. Fred, who's driving, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BACK OF WAGON 185
dialogues.text: Matrix gives up, leans exhaustedly against the paddy wagon wall, and looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: WATCH 186
dialogues.text: The watch reads 02:23:02 and counting. MATRIX 187

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix LOOKS HOPELESSLY at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The paddy wagon pulls up to a red light. To the side, Cindy ENTERS THE FRAME and drives the car up next to the wagon. The two cops glance over at her. Cindy smiles and winks at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daryl glances over at Fred. DARYL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hooker, not bad... The light turns green and Fred drives the wagon through the light. The wagon pulls ahead and Daryl looks into the outside, right rearview mirror.

dialogues.speaker: CINDY
dialogues.text: Her car remains stationary at the light. She is standing next to the car waving to Daryl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daryl looks over at Fred. DARYL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think she wants to give us something. Daryl looks back toward the rearview mirror. A85     55

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CLOSE SHOT of Cindy SHOWS her now with the LAW rocket launcher on her shoulder pointed at the paddy wagon. She pulls the trigger. BOOM!! A rocket SHOOTS out of the rear of the launcher and COMPLETELY DESTROYS a bus stop kiosk. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-oh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daryl is staring incredulously into the rearview mirror. MATRIX 194

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix, listening to the continuing explosion, reacts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy now has the launcher pointed correctly, and fires at the back tires of the wagon. BOOM!! The road underneath the back of the wagon EXPLODES and the back of the wagon is KNOCKED UPWARDS and the wagon CRASHES to its side and SKIDS along the road. The wagon slows and stops, the smoke clears and we SEE a giant hole along the back and bottom of the wagon. Matrix dazedly exits from the wagon, Cindy SCREECHES up in the car, Matrix dives in the back and she RACES AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daryl and Fred, dazed but unhurt are trying to get out of the wagon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy and Matrix are speeding off into the night. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you learn to do that? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: High' School. CUT TO: A65     56

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two heavily armed GUARDS patrol the perimeter wall of Arius' estate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arius and Bennett are in the living room surrounded by ten guerrillas. They are looking at a map of Val Verde.

dialogues.speaker: MAP 199-A
dialogues.text: The border of the country has arrows drawn at different areas showing where the guerrillas will enter the country.

dialogues.speaker: FAVORING ARIUS AND BENNETT 200
dialogues.text: ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How soon does Matrix arrive in Val Verde? Bennett glances at his watch. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just over two hours. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me know as soon as he lands. (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think he's going to give us any problems? BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll do anything we tell him as long as he thinks he'll get his daughter back. ARIUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'I wonder if he knows he's never going to get her back. Arius and Bennett look at each other. ROOM 201

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jenny moves to the door of her darkened room and tries the door handle. Cont. A85     57

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 201 Cont. It's tightly locked. She moves to a window and pulls at the boards over it. They don't move. She sits back down on the floor and begins to shiver. CUT TO: 202

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy and Matrix are in the car driving near the water in San Pedro. 203

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy is at the wheel, Matrix in the passenger seat. Cindy approaches a red light. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't stop. She drives through the light, takes a sharp left and begins driving on a street along the water. 204

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A police car, light FLASHING, turns onto the street up ahead, and begins RACING directly toward them. 205

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND CINDY
dialogues.text: Cindy glances at Matrix; he's watching the police car. The police car gets CLOSER and CLOSER to them as they continue to watch, then the police SPEED right past them, and FADE AWAY behind them. Cindy exhales her breath and glances at Matrix. He watches as the police disappear, then he turns and stares straight ahead. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON an old, beat-up Grauman Goose seaplane, then we PULL BACK TO REVEAL Cindy and Matrix parked near it. Cont. A85     58

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 206 Cont. They are at a deserted pier in San Pedro. Matrix looks at a lighted shack nearby. L' CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A guerrilla GUARD is in the small shack reading an aircraft manual. His feet are on the edge of the desk and he casually pushes his chair to tilt backwards. Matrix silently enters the shack and looks around. The guard's back is to Matrix.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD AND MATRIX 208
dialogues.text: The guard is TILTING his chair back and forth; Matrix is standing right behind him. The guard tilts his chair backward, Matrix circles his forearm around the man's neck and SLAMS him backward OUT OF FRAME to the floor. With his left hand, Matrix takes a ring of keys off of the wall. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy, the inflatable raft at her feet, is waiting at the plane as Matrix, carrying two duffel bags of equipment, approaches her. She takes the key ring from him, opens the door of the plane and Matrix begins to load the duffel bags inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy sits in the pilot's seat and stares at the controls as Matrix gets in the passenger seat. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't a plane... it's a canoe with wings. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Start paddling. Cant. A85     59

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 210 Cont. She plays with some controls and an engine starts to TURN OVER. She tries the other engine. It COUGHS and dies. She tries the engine again. It starts to turn over, then COUGHS and dies again. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, you piece of shit! He SLAMS his hand onto the control panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The engine STARTS UP!

dialogues.speaker: INT COCKPIT
dialogues.text: MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Works every time... Cindy REVS the engines and starts to move the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second guerrilla GUARD is RACING his jeep toward the plane. He FIRES with a pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! Bullets BLAST holes into the side of the plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! Bullets SMASH into the cockpit near Matrix and Cindy. Matrix lifts his submachine gun and FIRES it. BOOM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guard gets 4 bullets BLASTING into his chest, the jeep goes out of control and the jeep and guard go off the dock and CRASH into the water. A8 5     60

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy is RACING the amphibian across the water. They get CLOSER... CLOSER... CLOSER to a group of boats moored in the water. Just before they CRASH into them, Cindy pulls the seaplane up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pontoons on the seaplane just clear the masts on the boats!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix, looking shaken for the first time, glances over at Cindy. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what you're doing? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sort of... Matrix swallows a little, bit, then turns to look out the window. They're on their way! CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police cars with flashing lights surround the front of the Guns and Survival Equipment Store. Police officers look at the steamroller and the smashed front of the store. General Kirby moves away from the police and approaches a NONCOM DRIVER waiting by a government sedan. DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix? Kirby nods. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call the Federal Building. Have them monitor every police, aviation and marine channel in the area. DRIVER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you expecting? KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: World War III. CUT TO: A85     T I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy and Matrix are in the cockpit, the light frog, the control panel softly spilling onto their faces. The SOUND is the DRONE of the engines. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you decide to get a pilot's license? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My father was an Air Force pilot. That's why I becarle a stewardess. But after a while, I got tired of serving food' and drinks. I wanted to fly the plane myself. (PAUSING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess what I've really wanted all along was to be just like h:r:. She looks at Ma- !x. SUDDENLY the rad,c CRACKLE'--. RADIO VOICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention, unidentified aircraft. CUT Tr-,: INT. COAST GUAFo-l CUTTER - NIGHT 222 A RADAR INTERCEPT OFFICER (with headset and lip mke) is looking over the shoulder of a radar OPERATOR at a radar scanner. INTERCEPT OFFICER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the Coast Guard Cutter ' Mcrgenthal . ' You are f lyinc_ over the San Miguel Naval Gunnery Range. This is a restricted area. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They shoot the shit out of this area all the time. The flights out of LAX avoid it like the plague. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you get under the radar? CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not marine radar, but if we get close enough to the water, the high seas effect might camouflage us. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try it... Cindy dives the seaplane downward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy continues to pilot the seaplane just above the water. She reaches down to the back of her knee, feels it and grimaces. Matrix leans over, moves her hand and looks at what caused her to crimace. A nasty looking cut is starting to bleed. T':ATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When'd you get that? He reaches into one of his duffel bags and pulls out bandages and gauze. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car crash. Matrix Wipes her cut and puts the banda:7e dressinc over MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That reminds me of what I'm buying you as soon as we get back. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? She expertly wraps the gauze around her leg and ties it. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new car. CINDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a cassette deck? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a cassette deck... She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy , watching the fireballs and smoke in the distance, picks up her radio mike. CINDY (URGENT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coast Guard, this is whiskey, Xray, four, four, eight. Emergency priority message for General Frederick Kirby... COMMANDO!-! say again: COMMANDO! Code red at 38 degrees nine minutes north; 119 degrees 4 minutes west. Cindy lowers the mike and hits the the throttle, moving the seaplane along the coast closer to the bathe CUT TO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three GUERRILLAS jump into a jeep to get to the ACTION MATRIX 289

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix, lying hidden nearby, pulls a pin on a grenade and begins to count JEEP 290

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guerrillas start to pull away in the jeep as Matrix's grenade suddenly lands in the back of the jeep. Boom! the jeep EXPLODES TRANSPORT TRUCK 291

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twelve Guerrillas climb into the back of a transport truck and the truck ГўВ‚В¬ uic .ly gets underwa

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND TRUCK 292
dialogues.text: matrix runs in front of a pair of large gates that lead to the estate. QWDUCTION NOTE: These gates are at 5500 Palos Verde Drive), Matrix quickly studies the gates. Cont.. E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the rear _rkina area near the k?tc^>en, N;-m-: ix goes u; sone y ouutsice sГўВЂВћec then climbs onto the -c..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rose Garden is a long re 4a_ncle with runerou,:s self-containe , multi-eha_ e_ th_c}c hEdoes i-. the dIe o'f the garden. Arius is behind a hedge at one end or the garden and Matrix is behind a hedge abo,: t sixty _ f eet away at the other end of the garden. There is al sc a labyrinth of hedges between, the two men.  MATF:IX 3 9

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix watches the bullets BLAST throГўВЂВў.:ch the heCce near him. He crawls to the side, the. rises up an:: FIRES the automatic handgun at the he,:ce where he saw Arius. BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM! ARIL'S 330

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arius watches the bullets BLAST throuc the hedge near him. He starts crawling to the size and then crawls, following the hedge, towar6 Matrix. He and Matrix are like cat and mouse. MATRIX 331

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix is crawling, following a hedge, toward Arius. He cares up to the dear: Guerrilla with the flame thr; wer, that Matrix k.:iled in the Rose Garden earlier, then Matrix crawls around him. Arius peers over the to of a hedge.

dialogues.speaker: ARILS' F.O.V. 3-,
dialogues.text: he sees what looks l iue movement in a hedge. AR I is S Arms rises, FIRES his submachine gun at the movement, then quickly lowers himself to the g. rc He hears somerr: m lines.

dialogues.speaker: M A TRIX
dialogues.text: Chhhh... They are dying sounds. Arius cautiously rises, gun pointed at the hedge he shot at. The hits Arius and he SCREAMS . He runs A LAVE some light bushes, umps to the pat_c below, then falls down about eight feet away from a fountain and pool Of water. He crawls slowly toward the water, stretches his hand out, then. BURNS to death, his outstretched hand only six inches away from the fountain.   85

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the automatic handgun in his hand, Matrix enters the estate. GARDEN ROOM 342

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves silently through the garden room, looking at the dead bodies lying around the courtyard and front hall DINING ROOM 343

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He cautiously edges along the dining room. KITCHEN 344

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He enters the kitchen, then STOPS COLD. He looks at what's facing him. Bennett, holding Jenny, has the switchblade PRESSED AGAINST her throat. Matrix points his handgun right at Bennett. Bennett pulls Jenny close against his chest and face, shielding himself. BENNETT (MANIACAL)

dialogues.speaker: GO AHEAD, MATRIX, SHOOT
dialogues.text: Matrix hesitates, then lowers his gun. Jenny STRUGGLES in Bennett's grip. JENNY (SCREAMS)

dialogues.speaker: DAD
dialogues.text: BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (crazed, to Matrix)

dialogues.speaker: GET OUT OF HERE
dialogues.text: Matrix doesn't move. Bennett grabs Jenny's hair and pulls her head back, exposing her throat even more. He PRESSES the tip of the sharp stiletto against her Adam's apple. BENNETT (TO MATRIX)

dialogues.speaker: THROAT
dialogues.text: Matrix hesitates a short beat, then he moves back toward the dining room. A65     86 DINING ROOM 345

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix comes back into the dining room, leans against a wall, then puts his hand down to his wound. The red spotch is larger and wetter than before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett, with Jenny draped over his neck and shoulders like a towel, RACES out of the front of the estate toward a jeep parked in the front parking area. (NOTE: The rear parking area could also be used.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix hears SOUNDS of a jeep starting outside and he RACES into the front hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix RACES outside into the front parking area and sees Bennett driving Jenny away in the jeep. Matrix RACES into the parking area after them. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (PRODUCTION NOTE: The secens from here on are to be shot in Palos Verdes.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix RACES through the gates he blew up earlier, passes the shell of the blown up transport truck, leaves the road and RUNS over grassy knolls and sand dunes. JEEP 350

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up ahead in the distance, Bennett RACES the jeep toward the dock.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX 351
dialogues.text: Matrix's wound is bleeding badly and he begins to STRUGGLE to RUN for the first time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett, now dragging Jenny along, has left the jeep and is running along the dock. They stop at Arius' war boat, Bennett cuts the moorings with his knife, then he FORCES Jenny into the boat. A85     87 DOCK 353

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix nears the dock as Bennett tries to start the engines. The engines start to kick over, then stop. Matrix RACES onto the foot of the dock. Bennett desperately tries the engines again. They start! Matrix RACES toward the end of the dock. WAR BOAT 354

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett edges the war boat away from the dock, then BLASTS the engines and RACES the boat away... DOCK 355

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .just as Matrix reaches the end of the dock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix watches the boat RACE away with Jenny.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX 357
dialogues.text: Matrix has lost her. Bennett's got her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, he hears a NOISE and he looks to the side. SEAPLANE 359

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy is RACING her seaplane toward the dock! DOCK 360

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy slows the seaplane as she passes the dock and Matrix grabs onto a ladder. SEAPLANE 361

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: with Matrix hanging onto the ladder, Cindy BLASTS the throttle and RACES after Bennett's boat. MATRIX 362

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the seaplane starts to GO FASTER, Matrix holds onto the ladder and looks at Bennett's boat up ahead. A85     88

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett's boat is about FORTY YARDS ahead of the seaplane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy PUSHES the throttle FASTER. She watches as the seaplane starts to slowly overtake the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The seaplane is SKIMMING and SKIPPING over the water. MATRIX 366

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind and spray SLAP against Matrix as he watches the seaplane closing the gap on the boat. He climbs from the ladder onto the wing of the plane, the propellers only about five feet away from him. He CRAWLS along the wing of the plane, the wind WHIPPING at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy glances out toward Matrix on the wing, then she GRIPS the controls FIRMLY to try to lessen the plane's bouncing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The seaplane closes to about FIFTEEN YARDS from the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett looks behind him and sees the seaplane COMING AFTER HIM. Trying to steer with one hand, Bennett turns toward the seaplane as the boat bounces and FIRES WILDLY at Matrix on the wing. SLAM? BLAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bullets WHISTLE by Matrix. He continues crawling along the wing until he reaches the very end. He pulls his gun from his holster and aims it toward the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix tries to aim the gun through the sight, but the bouncing of the seaplane, the bouncing of the boat, and Jenny's nearness to Bennett makes a shot too risky. A85     89 MATRIX 372

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix lowers his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy PUSHES the throttle even FASTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The seaplane starts to PULL EVEN with Bennett's boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett looks to the side and sees Cindy in the cockpit almost even with him. Starting to panic, he FIRES WILDLY as he tries to steer the bouncing boat. BLAM! BLAM! BLAM'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A buttet BLASTS into the seaplane body and a second bullet BLASTS into just underneath the cockpit side window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The third bullet SHATTERS the cockpit window and EXPLODES into the cockpit near Cindy's head. Cindy doesn't flinch a bit, and edges the seaplane ahead of the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy has positioned the seaplane so that the wing Matrix is on is directly over the boat. Bennett sees the underside of the wing above and FIRES into the bottom of it, hoping to hit Matrix. SLAM! SLAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullet holes RIP through the wing inches from Matrix's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix DIVES off the wing right into the boat directly on top of Bennett!! They CRASH into Jenny and HIT the floor of the boat. A85     90

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 380 Cont. Matrix grabs Bennett's gun hand and they wrestle for the gun. BLAM! A shot BLASTS into the fuel tank at the stern of the boat. WHOOM! There's a small EXPLOSION and the rear of the boat erupts in FLAMES. Jenny DIVES toward the front of the boat for cover. The steering wheel, unattended, shifts WILDLY back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boat is bouncing CRAZILY toward a deserted rocky beach.

dialogues.speaker: SIGN 382
dialogues.text: A large sign on the beach reads "DANGER - U.S. COAST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cindy, in the seaplane, watches as both the seaplane and burning boat SPEED RIGHT TOWARD the increasingly LOOMING beach up ahead. At the last minute, Cindy SWERVES the seaplane to the right, away from the beach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The burning boat continues to RACE DIRECTLY AT THE

dialogues.speaker: RAPIDLY APPROACHING ROCKY BEACH
dialogues.text: Matrix SAVAGELY TWISTS Bennett's wrist hand that holds the gun. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: AAAHHH
dialogues.text: He drops the gun on the floor of the boat. The boat is JUST ABOUT TO HIT THE BEACH! Matrix SMASHES Bennett's face with his fist, KNOCKING him down onto the floor near Jenny. Cont. A85     91

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ,384 Cont. The BURNING BOAT narrowly misses the rocks and SLAMS

dialogues.speaker: INTO THE BEACH
dialogues.text: Bennett and Jenny are THROWN across the floor and SLAM into the inside wall of the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix, standing,,is THROWN OUT of the boat, FLIES through the air and SLAMS into a spongy patch of sand. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CAPTAIN on the bridge of a Coast Guard patrol ship looks toward the ship's large guns. CAPTAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commence target practice... The guns begin to fire their salvos. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix groggily gathers himself on the sand. He hears the SOUNDS of incoming rounds and BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! Artillery shells EXPLODE on the beach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett grabs Jenny and hustles her out of the boat, hiding behind the front outside hull of the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix runs to the opposite side of the boat, and crouches down on the sand, then draws his automatic handgun from its holster. BOOM! BOOM! Some more artillery shells EXPLODE, kicking up sand not too far away. Bennett, his knife against Jenny, is on one side of the boat. Matrix, holding his gun, is on the other side of the boat. Cont. A85     92

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 389 Cont. MATRIX (SHOUTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This doesn't involve her, Bennett. It's just between you...and me. An artillery shell EXPLODES near Bennett and Jenny.

dialogues.speaker: BENNETT 390
dialogues.text: A CLOSEUP of Bennett shows him REACTING disorientedly to the SOUND, SMOKE AND FLASH of the explosion.

dialogues.speaker: ABRUPT CUT TO
dialogues.text: QUICK FLASHBACK 391

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett and Matrix have their faces pressed to the dirt as a mortar shell EXPLODES near their heads. Bennett gets up, wildly looks around, then maniacally FIRES his submachine gun, KILLING three young children running scared across a Val Verde field. Matrix rises and SMASHES his rifle butt into Bennett's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennett's crazed mind returns to the present. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her go, Bennett and I'll give you a chance to twist that knife into me. The stern of the boat continues to burn as Bennett considers what Matrix said. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just what I thought, Bennett, you're still a yellow chicken-shit. Bennett's eyes fill with hate. More shells EXPLODE nearby. BENNETT (SCREAMS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throw the gun away, Matrix!! Cont. A8 5     93

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 392 Cont. Matrix tosses the gun away down the beach. Bennett violently pushes Jenny into the wet sand along the edge of the water. MATRIX 393

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix takes his knife out of his wrist sheath and meets Bennett on the sand in front of the boat.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND BENNETT 394
dialogues.text: Matrix and Bennett begin to circle each other. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dead... He feints the knife toward Matrix. BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .and so is she. JENNY 395

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jenny watches the fight in horror.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND BENNETT 396
dialogues.text: Bennett jabs with his knife and SLASHES Matrix, causing a bloody cut. Bennett jabs again. This time Matrix parries the jab, and SLASHES Bennett, causing a bloody cut on him. They circle each other again, FEINTING jabs at each other. BOOM! BOOM! Two more shells EXPLODE and kick up sand nearby. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lieutenant pilots a copter as General Kirby, sitting next to him, speaks into a radio mike. They are flying along the coast of the island, another Army helicopter behind them. They HEAR the SOUNDS of the explosions. KIRBY (INTO MIKE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop that shelling NOW! A85     94

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennets STABS at Matrix and Matrix grabs his wrist. With his free hand, Matrix STABS at Bennett and Bennett grabs Matrix's wrist. They are locked hand in hand, staring death into each other's eyes. JENNY 399

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jenny, watching the fight, notices Matrix's gun on the beach near her and hesitates to pick it up.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND BENNETT 400
dialogues.text: Suddenly Matrix falls backward to the ground, pulling Bennett with him and FLIPS Bennett over him HARD to the sand. Matrix jumps up quickly to finish Bennett. Bennett quickly THROWS SAND in matrix's eyes. Matrix, blinded, stumbles badly. Bennett immediately grabs Matrix's knife hand around the wrist, then SINKS his own knife into Matrix's side. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: AAAHHH
dialogues.text: Matrix's eyes go glassy, then he drops his knife. Bennett lets Matrix's wrist go, looks at Matrix's glassy eyes for a beat, then he pulls his knife out of Matrix's side. Matrix STAGGERS for a beat, then STUMBLES a few steps and drops to one knee against the front outside hull of the boat. Bennett slowly approaches Matrix from behind, casually feeling the blade of his knife. He looks at Matrix's wide, unprotected back and Bennett smiles. Bennett pulls the knife back with his arm, preparing to plunge it into Matrix's back.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX 401
dialogues.text: Out of Bennett's sight, Matrix slips the knife out of his boot and GRIPS the knife. A85     95

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND BENNETT 402
dialogues.text: BENNETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you, asshole... He PLUNGES the knife down toward Matrix's back. Matrix moves LIKE LIGHTNING to the side. The knife misses him and GETS STUCK in the hull of the boat. Matrix turns toward Bennett. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shaking his head) No... Bennett tries desperately to get his knife unstuck from the boat hull, but he can't. Fear FLOODS his eyes. Matrix moves close to Bennett. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck YOU, asshole... He DRIVES his knife into Bennett's throat so hard the knife goes through Bennett's neck and comes out the other side. Still holding the knife, Matrix then DRIVES the knife into the hull of the boat. The knife STICKS into the hull, holding Bennett's neck there like a thumbtack holds a note on a bulletin board. BOOM? Suddenly there is another, larger EXPLOSION in the fiery back of the boat and the whole boat EXPLODES into FLAMES, leaving Bennett lost in the fireball.

dialogues.speaker: MATRIX AND JENNY 403
dialogues.text: Matrix limps away from the flames, Jenny rushes into his arms and he holds her close. She's crying. She shows him she was holding his gun. JENNY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted to shoot...but I couldn't, I just couldn't. Matrix looks at her. Cont. A85     96

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 403 Cont. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know something? I'm glad you couldn't. He takes the gun from her and tosses it past the burning boat into the ocean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees two Army helicopters approaching from the air and Cindy bringing her seaplane to the beach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matrix lies down, his head in Jenny's lap, and tries to still his bleeding. The two copters land. Kirby gets out of one and two medical corpsmen with a stretcher get out of the other. The corpsmen bring the stretcher to Matrix and gently ease him onto it. They start to carry him as Jenny walks alongside. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just saw what's left of Arius' estate... You're the best I've ever known, John... I've saved a place for you if you want to join up with me again. Matrix notices as Cindy joins Jenny standing next to him. Matrix looks at the two of them, then up at Kirby. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was the last one... The corpsmen carry Matrix into the copter and Jenny joins him inside. Kirby and Cindy watch him from outside the chopper. KIRBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about your identities... Don't you need two more? MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... Cont. A85     97

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 405 Cont. ICIRB Y (CONFUSED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? Matrix looks at Cindy. MATRIX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two might not be enough... The chopper wings have started and the chopper is preparing to liftoff. Matrix and Cindy are looking at each other. The chopper starts to liftoff. Cindy suddenly RUNS to the chopper and JUMPS in the door as it lifts off. Matrix puts his arm around her, then he looks back toward Kirby. Matrix holds up three fingers and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kirby waves good-bye as the chopper rises high above the beach and flies out over the ocean. FADE OUT THE END
